mapper.select: SELECT t.unit_code,t.unit_name FROM stp_unit_field t GROUP BY t.unit_code, t.unit_name
SELECT t.department_code,department_name FROM stp_unit_field t WHERE t.unit_name=#{unitName} GROUP BY t.department_code,t.department_name
SELECT professional_field_name FROM stp_unit_field t WHERE t.unit_name=#{unitName} AND t.department_name=#{departmentName} GROUP BY professional_field_name
